title: Looking for someone to duo ranked with
body:
Started playing again about a week ago (or so) after watching worlds etc. got the itch.
Previously I was in gold I'm now back down in bronze3 after a lengthy break. Just looking for decent,cool players to duo with and grind back up the ranks.
Would prefer if you had a mic also.
Prefer adc: Lucian,twitch atm
Or top: gnar

iGN: MainzE

replies.body: cool man shoot me a add, ign - MainzE
